title: Mordekaiser
body: I have 758k mastery on mordekaiser, and i can't play this new garbage ass champ. thanks riot.

replies.body: Bruh, you're really complaining? Every new champion/rework is hard to get in draft for like 1 patch, and you're going to say fuck Riot because they reworked a champion that REALLY needed it?
i am complaining cux its a shit champion that is nothing at all the same about him

I mean Im not a 1 million point mordekaiser main, but I played enough of him pre work to say that honestly it doesn't feel that different, in fact he feels better to play.
1st they take vladimir from me, then taric, now morde, fuck riot
You know it's funny just as I was turning on my computer I was thinking to myself "I wonder what Mordekaiser mains think of the new rework?"
Where you get the morde icon?

I've loved every rework except maybe Warwick and Akali. Most of the time it's an upgrade in the visuals and over all feel of the champ. Sadly they are often bogged down by shitty gimmicks that can't be balanced properly making them initially broken, and then Riot almost always over nerfs champions either in one patch or progressively and consistently each subsequent patch.

{{champion:266}}  Amazing at first, quickly gutted, then changed, now broken again and nerfed down again. Cannot be balanced.

{{champion:3}}  Super OP, and had literally everything in his kit from shields, cc, tankyness, and fucking raw damage. Consistently nerfed every patch since and still an amazingly strong tank support. Success imo cause he's my favorite champ, but cannot be balanced as is.

{{champion:84}} True invisibility? Nope. Broken. Deserved all the nerfs, but is now over nerfed and unplayable.

{{champion:43}}  Her mains fucking hate her and they are the only ones who played her, and now I never see her played. 
 
I could go into the soft remakes like {{champion:81}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:53}}  etc, but those are just minor updates and their kits weren't completely changed.
